Staff Picks

A handpicked selection that we love and we think you will too

  • Soap
  • Lotion
  • Candles

Fresh Cut Grass Artisan Bar

When the seasons are a’changin, we still offer you one more memory of the spring and summer.. Fresh Cut Grass, scented to remind you of the past and future wonderful seasons.

Sugar Lotion

Sweet, just like you! We’ve tried many renditions of this lovely Aquolina type. Like the story of Goldilocks and the 3 bears, some were too sweet, others were too perfumy, but at last this one is just right!

Cinnamon Buns Soy Candle

Rich butter, gooey rolls, with cinnamon swimming in caramelized sugar, and a hint of frosting. This is one you won’t be able to pry your nose away from. This candle is deliciously rich and will last for many hours.

A Bit About Us

SoGa Artisan Soaperie encourages consumers to make conscientious choices about the personal care products they buy. Consumers who care about animals can make humane decisions that benefit laboratory animals

By Louise
